Election 2023: High-ranking National Party figures meet at Christopher Luxon’s Auckland home https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/election-2023-high-ranking-national-party-figures-meet-at-christopher-luxons-auckland-home/ETX5Y6ETZVCM5DXBYOQS3E5W44/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/election-2023-high-ranking-national-party-figures-meet-at-christopher-luxons-auckland-home/ETX5Y6ETZVCM5DXBYOQS3E5W44/ Adam PearseA long strategy meeting with Nicola Willis and other MPs took place. Helensville Golf Club hotshot: Pensioner Ron Jenkins snags hole-in-one - twice in three days https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/helensville-golf-club-hotshot-pensioner-ron-jenkins-snags-hole-in-one-twice-in-third-days/6W2HADZFPNFBVBJLICYTV5EULM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/helensville-golf-club-hotshot-pensioner-ron-jenkins-snags-hole-in-one-twice-in-third-days/6W2HADZFPNFBVBJLICYTV5EULM/ Craig KapitanThe ex-teacher had five previous hole-in-ones, but it had been a decade since his last. Sun, 15 Oct 2023 03:55:01 +0000 Ron Jenkins of Red Beach scored two holes in one in the same week at the Helensville Golf Club.
Election 2023: Suze Redmayne will be first female MP for Rangitīkei https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/news/election-2023-suze-redmayne-will-be-first-female-mp-for-rangitikei/RZ2XLP4PIJFADESYD7DS77C47Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/news/election-2023-suze-redmayne-will-be-first-female-mp-for-rangitikei/RZ2XLP4PIJFADESYD7DS77C47Q/ Finn WilliamsRedmayne's immediate plans included increasing the police presence in Feilding. Simon Wilson: The Labour collapse - fit for the war but not for the peace https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/simon-wilson-the-labour-collapse-fit-for-the-war-but-not-for-the-peace/ETSGLL7JAVBAHAVZZOXRGD4YZ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/simon-wilson-the-labour-collapse-fit-for-the-war-but-not-for-the-peace/ETSGLL7JAVBAHAVZZOXRGD4YZ4/ Simon WilsonLabour won the pandemic war, but did not know how to win the peace that followed.
